meta.name: Medical Symptom Analysis & Doctor Recommendations with Ollama AI & WhatsApp

parameters.content:
## üè• AI Symptom Checker & Doctor Suggestion

**Complete Medical Assistant Workflow:**

üîç **Symptom Analysis** - AI analyzes symptoms with urgency assessment
üë®‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è **Doctor Matching** - Finds relevant specialists in user's area

## üõ†Ô∏è Setup Requirements:

**APIs & Services:**
1. **BetterDoctor API** - Doctor directory (free tier)
2. **WhatsApp Business API** - Meta Developer account
3. **SMTP Email** - For email notifications
4. **Ollama** - Local AI model

**Input Format (Webhook):**
```json
{
  "symptoms": "headache, fever, nausea",
  "age": 30,
  "gender": "male",
  "duration": "2 days",
  "phone": "+1234567890",
  "email": "user@email.com",
  "location": "New York, NY"
}
```

**Test URL:**
POST https://your-n8n-instance.com/webhook/symptom-checker-webhook
